author: Good Enough
description:
On April 26, 1986, the world changed forever. The Chernobyl nuclear disaster released more radiation than 400 Hiroshima bombs, instantly altering the lives of millions. This short dives into the scale, impact, and haunting legacy of the worst nuclear accident in history. From the explosion at Reactor 4 to the ghost city of Pripyat, discover the chilling facts behind this man-made catastrophe.

#chernobyl #NuclearDisaster #HistoryUncovered #DarkHistory #Radiation #ExclusionZone #DidYouKnow #MindBlown #TrueStory #ScienceExplained
title: The Largest Nuclear Disaster in History 💥 😰 #didyouknow #chernobyl #darkhistory #unbelievable
